org.hibernate.validator.cfg.context

接口 MethodConstraintMappingContext

  • 所有超级接口:
    AnnotationIgnoreOptions<MethodConstraintMappingContext>, CrossParameterTarget, ParameterTarget, ReturnValueTarget

    public interface MethodConstraintMappingContext
extends ParameterTarget, CrossParameterTarget, ReturnValueTarget, AnnotationIgnoreOptions<MethodConstraintMappingContext>
    Constraint mapping creational context representing a method. Allows to navigate to the method's parameters and return value.

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.hibernate.validator.cfg.context.ParameterTarget

        parameter

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.hibernate.validator.cfg.context.CrossParameterTarget

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.hibernate.validator.cfg.context.ReturnValueTarget

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.hibernate.validator.cfg.context.AnnotationIgnoreOptions
